column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////They know their ingredients and how to incorporate them into a full-flavored broth and create an unforgettable combination with handmade noodles. Plus
column2: they apparently only use Fuji water to prepare the high quality broth! There's a wide array of authentic toppings to add to your ramen bowl and take it to the next level. Everyone will have different tastes
column3: but I personally enjoy the premium tonkotsu white
column5: and spicy chicken. Not too salty
column7: noodle and fat--such a perfect balance of flavors! I usually get my ramen fix with a single bowl alone since it's so filling
column8: but the combinations and tapas are pretty cool when you've been starving yourself lately. Plus
column9: I love that they offer iced green tea!
